name: id
description: This is used for the main component and to compose the ID attribute for each item.

name: idPrefix
description: String to prefix id for each tab item if no id is specified on each item.

name: title
description: Title for the tabs table of contents.

params.name: id
params.description: Specific ID attribute for the tab item. If omitted, then `idPrefix` string is required instead.

params.name: label
params.description: The text label of a tab item.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the tab.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each tab panel. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the each tab panel. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the tab panel.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the tabs component.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the tabs component.
